name: 6.1 "Home is the Sailor" Trivia Game | 'Cheers'- Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who joined the cast with this episode?
questions.explanation:
Kirstie Alley.

	Kirstie Alley auditioned for the role of Rebecca Howe by donning a Shelley Long style blonde wig. She quickly got the role and was loved by the cast. Rhea Perlman became her best friend.

questions.text: What time did Woody tell Eddie it was?
questions.explanation:
3:15.

	Eddie asked Woody what was wrong with Norm because he wouldn't give him the time of day. Woody, not understanding the expression, told him that it was 3:15. He then said, "Can I get you a drink or did you just come in for the time?"

options: It was eaten by a shark.
questions.explanation:
It sunk.

	The others didn't expect to see Sam when he walked in the door because the was supposed to be sailing around the world. Sam informed them that his boat sank so he came back to Cheers.

questions.text: Carla was pregnant again. Who was the father this time?
questions.explanation:
Eddie & Eddie LeBec.

	Carla was showing but hadn't told Eddie yet about her pregnancy. She said she was waiting for the right time.

questions.text: Besides Woody, who was the other bartender in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Wayne.

	Wayne was played by Jonathan Stark. Stark was born in 1952 in Erie, PA. Besides acting he is also a writer and producer.

questions.text: What was Sam's first "word" to Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
"Boo-ah".

	He was stunned when he saw how beautiful Rebecca was. They did not hit it off at first because she was rather cold in the beginning and because Sam was rather lecherous toward her.

questions.text: What was the name of Sam's moose head?
questions.explanation:
Dave.

	Rebecca had taken Sam's moose head down, much to Sam's dismay. He was not happy with the changes she made to Cheers and still thought of it as his bar.

questions.text: Had Rebecca ever heard of Sam as a baseball player?
questions.explanation:
no.

	Sam named some other baseball players and Rebecca said the difference was she had heard of those people. Sam replied, "A lot of people might not know this but I happen to be quite famous".

questions.text: Why did Rebecca say she hired Sam?
options: She was told to by a higher power
questions.explanation:
Pity.

	Sam asked Rebecca why she hired him and she told him it was pity. Later on, her bosses told her to make him a full time bartender.

questions.text: What drink did they make up to get rid of the other bartender?
questions.explanation:
Screaming Viking.

	The Screaming Viking that was made up for the show became a real cocktail drink and can be purchased at the Bull and Finch Pub in Boston, MA. as well as some other places. Each place makes it a little bit differently.
